Description: Postcard; printed paper; a photograph showing Nouzha Garden at Alexandria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally unused;but message on the reverse reads: "Sidi Bishr Ymett 21/4/16. My dearest Florrie, Your mid week letter hasn't yet arrived although the mail has but I still live in hope. As a mail leaves tomorrow I am sending you a few pcs [postcards]. This view is of those gardens when the ... took me a few times. I took a photo of this which I am going to send you". Same sender and recipient as EPH-ME 2917.
